subject: Good Day, Note that I'm pati
body:
Good Day, Note that I'm patient enough if you are not interested kindly notify me so that i will look for another partner that can work with me in the success of this transaction.
Note that i can screenshot the account and forward to you to be rest assure this is 100% guarantee  deal
Kind Regards,
Mr. Jerry Wilson

subject: Re:   Good Day, Note that I'm pati
body:
Hello Mr. Jerry Wilson,

Good day to you too! I appreciate your patience and your willingness to share this opportunity with me. It's always exciting to hear about new ventures.

Could you please provide more details about the nature of this partnership? What kind of work would it involve? And how does the account screenshot come into play?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Virginia
